title: Practical Placeholders
text: loripsum() function probably best go-place holder text API package, provides control output far contents concerned. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Itaque hic ipse iam pridem est reiectus; Bork Prodest, inquit, mihi eo esse animo. Huius ego nunc auctoritatem sequens idem faciam. Hic ambiguo ludimur. Satis est ad hoc responsum. Bork Quae controversiam veniunt, de iis, si placet, disseramus. Quid enim? Quae sequuntur igitur? Ecce aliud simile dissimile. Sed quid attinet de rebus tam apertis plura requirere? Quare attende, quaeso. Sed finge non solum callidum eum, qui aliquid improbe faciat, verum etiam praepotentem, ut M. Bork Scientiam pollicentur, quam non erat mirum sapientiae cupido patria esse cariorem. Quid vero? Sed nonne merninisti licere mihi ista probare, quae sunt te dicta? Quamquam hac divisione rem ipsam prorsus probo, elegantiam desidero. Quamquam haec quidem praeposita recte et reiecta dicere licebit. Qui igitur convenit ab alia voluptate dicere naturam proficisci, alia summum bonum ponere? Quis non odit sordidos, vanos, leves, futtiles? Hic ego: Pomponius quidem, inquam, noster iocari videtur, et fortasse suo iure. Sed quid minus probandum quam esse aliquem beatum nec satis beatum? Ab oratores, ab imperatores ac rerum publicarum principes extiterunt. Quorum altera prosunt, nocent altera. Satisne igitur videor vim verborum tenere, sum etiam nunc vel Graece loqui vel Latine docendus? Est autem etiam actio quaedam corporis, quae motus et status naturae congruentis tenet; iam decimum annum spelunca iacet. Nemo igitur esse beatus potest. Sed hoc sane concedamus. certe gravius. Bork Duo Reges: constructio interrete. Ne discipulum abducam, times. Sed haec omittamus; Est, ut dicis, inquit;
code: example_loripsum <-   loripsum(     n = 3L,     length = "short",     decorate = TRUE, # adds italics, bold, etc.     link = TRUE, # adds some links     ul = TRUE, # adds an unordered list (bullets)     ol = TRUE, # adds an ordererd list (numbers)     dl = TRUE, # adds a description list (headers and contents)     bq = TRUE, # adds a blockquote     code = TRUE, # adds code samples     headers = FALSE, # adds headers - may mess with RMarkdown/Quarto!     allcaps = FALSE, # capitalises the whole output     prude = TRUE # see above note   ) Nam constitui virtus nullo modo potesti nisi ea, quae sunt prima naturae, ut ad summam pertinentia tenebit.  Illud urgueam, non intellegere eum quid sibi dicendum sit, cum dolorem summum malum esse dixerit.

title: Whimsical Placeholders

code: example_metaphor <-   metaphorpsum(n_paras = 2,                n_sentences = 4,                p = FALSE) # use p tags?

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: baconipsum() hipsteripsum() similar options identical simply (partly) replace random Latin lorem ipsum meat words hipster-y phrases, respectively. MEAT: Bacon ipsum dolor amet pork belly meatball landjaeger hamburger meatloaf t-bone cupim. Tongue jerky tri-tip jowl. Filet mignon shoulder fatback, cow jerky kielbasa pork chop frankfurter short ribs beef ribs t-bone pork jowl. Flank drumstick rump andouille tri-tip pork belly pig meatloaf strip steak fatback chicken. Boudin pork loin turkey, doner leberkas pastrami shoulder pork beef ribs meatball andouille bresaola turducken. HIPSTER: ’m baby sriracha forage cornhole man bun whatever selvage live-edge yes plz pour-. Ethical pabst marxism 8-bit squid, sustainable shaman flexitarian farm--table. vape raw denim tofu listicle. Succulents meh pug, iceland bespoke hell pinterest skateboard knausgaard. Fit health goth bespoke, venmo next level woke bodega boys meditation ugh mustache locavore lo-fi.
code: example_meat <- baconipsum(n_sentences = 5L,                            type = "all-meat",                            start_with_lorem = TRUE)  example_hipster <- hipsteripsum(n_sentences = 5L,                                 type = "hipster-centric",                                 start_with_lorem = TRUE)

Whimsical, playful generators impersonate celebrities, list names dinosaurs, use profanity, . perhaps appropriate personal projects!

what: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum
title: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum
text: Generates placeholder text , first glance, looks like regular Lorem Ipsum, actually meat-related words.

title: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum
code: baconipsum(   n_paras = 5L,   n_sentences = NULL,   type = c("all-meat", "meat-and-filler"),   start_with_lorem = TRUE )

title: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum
text: https://baconipsum.com/

title: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. n_sentences Integer, optional. number sentences generate. Overrides n_paras. type Character. One "-meat" meat words , "meat--filler" meat mixed random lorem ipsum words. Defaults "-meat". start_with_lorem Logical. TRUE, starts first paragraph 'Bacon ipsum dolor sit amet'. Defaults TRUE.

title: Generate Corporate-sounding placeholder text using the CorporateLorem API — corporatelorem
text: n Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. paragraphs Logical. TRUE, shows paragraph tags output. Defaults TRUE. textformat Logical. TRUE, returns single text string. Otherwise returns named list source paragraphs.. Defaults TRUE.

API — litipsum
code: litipsum(n = NULL, tag = NULL, source = NULL)

title:
Obtain a random passage from copyright-free literature using the Lit Ipsum
API — litipsum
text: https://litipsum.com/

title:
Obtain a random passage from copyright-free literature using the Lit Ipsum
API — litipsum
text: n Integer, optional. number paragraphs generate. default, NULL, generates one "page" text source. tag Character, optional. One "p" "li", renders paragraphs p li tags, respectively. source Character, optional. book take placeholder text. One adventures-sherlock-holmes, dr-jekyll--mr-hyde, dracula, evelina, life--samuel-johnson, picture--dorian-gray, pride--prejudice. default, NULL, chooses one random.

what: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
text: Generates random, customisable placeholder text using Loripsum Web API.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
code: loripsum(   n = 5L,   length = "short",   decorate = FALSE,   link = FALSE,   ul = FALSE,   ol = FALSE,   dl = FALSE,   bq = FALSE,   code = FALSE,   headers = FALSE,   allcaps = FALSE,   prude = FALSE,   plaintext = FALSE )

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
text: https://loripsum.net/

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
text: n Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. length Character. average length paragraph. Can "short", "medium", "long" "verylong". Defaults "short". decorate Logical. TRUE, bold, italic marked text. Defaults FALSE. link Logical. TRUE, adds links. Defaults FALSE. ul Logical. TRUE, adds unordered lists. Defaults FALSE. ol Logical. TRUE, adds numbered/ordered lists. Defaults FALSE. dl Logical. TRUE, adds description lists. Defaults FALSE. bq Logical. TRUE, adds blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. code Logical. TRUE, adds code samples. Defaults FALSE. headers Logical. TRUE, adds headers. Defaults FALSE. allcaps Logical. TRUE, uses CAPS. Defaults FALSE. prude Logical. TRUE, removes Latin words construed offensive English, like 'sex' 'homo'. Defaults FALSE. plaintext Logical. TRUE, returns plain text without HTML tags. Defaults FALSE.

what: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
text: Generates customisable placeholder text using Lorem Markdownum API, formatted markdown.

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
code: markdownum(   n = 5L,   no_headers = FALSE,   no_code = FALSE,   no_inline_markup = FALSE,   no_quotes = FALSE,   no_lists = FALSE,   no_external_links = FALSE,   no_wrapping = FALSE,   underline_headers = FALSE,   reference_links = FALSE,   underscore_em = FALSE,   underscore_strong = FALSE,   fenced_code_blocks = FALSE )

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
text: https://jaspervdj./lorem-markdownum/

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
text: n Integer. number "blocks" generate. Defaults 5. no_headers Logical. TRUE, removes headers. Defaults FALSE. no_code Logical. TRUE, removes code snippets. Defaults FALSE. no_inline_markup Logical. TRUE, removes inline markup. Defaults FALSE. no_quotes Logical. TRUE, removes blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. no_lists Logical. TRUE, removes lists. Defaults FALSE. no_external_links Logical. TRUE, replaces external links internal links. Defaults FALSE. no_wrapping Logical. TRUE, prevents text wrapping. Defaults FALSE. underline_headers Logical. TRUE, headers underlined. Defaults FALSE. reference_links Logical. TRUE, uses reference-style links. Defaults FALSE. underscore_em Logical. TRUE, styles  using underscores. Defaults FALSE. underscore_strong Logical. TRUE, styles  using double underscores. Defaults FALSE. fenced_code_blocks Logical. TRUE, fences code blocks back-ticks. Defaults FALSE.

title: Obtain wise, pedantic metaphors using the Metaphorpsum API — metaphorpsum
